alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 9:36AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...Rainfall from 1" to 1-1/4" is expected through late tonight. The river will fall through early this evening before rising to a crest of 21.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.5 Wed 8 am CST 20.5 20.7 20.8 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
